channel.title: Whirlwind Wheelchair
channel.description: A non-profit social enterprise dedicated to improving the lives of people with disabilities in the developing world while also promoting sustainable local economic development

item.title: 2014 Whirlwind Wheelchair Newsletter
item.dc:creator: Israel Curtis
item.description: In this issue: Whirlwind moves to Berkeley Introducing RoughRider America Ebola Halts WPAC in Sierra Leone Hand Cycles and RoughRiders in Ethiopia 25th Anniversary of the ADA Download the 2014 Newsletter here .
item.content:encoded:
In this issue:
  • Whirlwind moves to Berkeley
  • Introducing RoughRider America
  • Ebola Halts WPAC in Sierra Leone
  • Hand Cycles and RoughRiders in Ethiopia
  • 25th Anniversary of the ADA
  • Download the 2014 Newsletter here .
